title: Get results from multiple tables based on relationship table
body:
I have dbo.Users tables

Id, Name
1, John
2, Mary
3, Michael

Then I have dbo.Phones table

Id, Phonenumber
10, 1234
11, 5555

Then I have dbo.Relationship table

Id, ChildId
1, 10
2, 11

How could I make a query that returns

Id, Name, Phonenumber
1, John, 1234
2, Mary, 5555
3, Michael, NULL

This is what I got so far.

SELECT u.Id, u.Name, p.Phonenumber
FROM dbo.Users as u
LEFT JOIN dbo.Phones as p
-- Something

SQL Fiddle
